author: Sports Staff, Sports Staff
title: Raymond van Barneveld gets one over rival Phil Taylor as 'Stay at Home Darts' match raises £15,000 for charity
description: Great darts rivals rolled back the years with eventual winner Van Barneveld fighting back from 6-3 down to triumph and come within one dart of a nine-dart finish
content:
Five-time world champion Raymond Van Barneveld recovered from 6-3 down to beat Phil Taylor in a charity darts match played from their living rooms.
It was billed as the biggest clash in stay-at-home darts history with Van Barneveld winning 7-6 as he renewed … [+1438 chars]
